name: Stickfigurate
description:
Stickfigurate WAS intended for the 2nd annual E1M1 Magazine Game Jam, however I have backed out after 13 days due to this month being super busy among other reasons.

You can read why I canned Stickfigurate here.

If you wanna play Stickfigurate, you can click here to get the source files (instructions are within the page)

If you wanna listen to the OST, you can do so on Bandcamp or SoundCloud
